summary: Completed testing of K9 Trainer Booking and NASDU Courses features. Backend APIs (22/22 tests passed) and frontend UI both working correctly. BookK9Trainer page shows 'Our K9 Team' (3 trainers - bookable) and 'Approved 3rd Party Trainers' (5 trainers with Coming Soon badges). Elite NASDU Courses page displays 6 course cards with prices and course details dialog.

features: Our K9 Team section with 'Available Now' badge
3 Our Team trainer cards with green 'Book Now' buttons
Approved 3rd Party Trainers section with 'Coming Soon' badge
5 Approved trainer cards with grayscale effect and disabled buttons
Pricing overview cards (Virtual, Home Visit, Emergency 24/7)
Booking dialog with session type tabs (Virtual/Home Visit/24/7)
Duration selector, date/time inputs, cost breakdown
Hero section with SIA Approved badge
Book Courses Now - Pay with Stripe badge
Stats bar (2,500+ graduates, 45 centres, 100% recognition, 94% placement)
Category tabs (All, Patrol, General Purpose, Detection, Tracking, Refresher)
6 course cards with prices, duration, location
Course details dialog with units, skills, prerequisites, career paths
Pay & Enroll button for Stripe checkout

mocked_apis.NASDU Pre-Test: Marked as 'Coming Soon' - no actual pre-test functionality

critical_code_review_comments: All trainer APIs correctly return our_team and approved_contractors arrays
Course prices properly include commission (12% service fee)
Booking dialog shows real-time cost calculation
Stripe checkout integration ready for trainer booking and course enrollment
seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - trainers and courses loaded from static data files
context_for_next_testing_agent: BookK9Trainer page at /book-trainer shows Our K9 Team (3 trainers with Book Now) and Approved 3rd Party (5 trainers with Coming Soon). Elite NASDU Courses at /elite-courses (NOT /nasdu-courses) shows 6 course cards. Stripe payment integration uses emergentintegrations library. Pre-Test is MOCKED as Coming Soon.
